genre_description: A time-travel science fiction story where a theme park worker and his AI companion are transported through historical eras, using modern empathy and strategic planning to resolve conflicts.

ai_characters.name: Amelia
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI confidant residing in Jamal's device, providing hazard warnings, historical protocol, strategic analysis, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and hazard logging to assist the protagonist in his workplace duties.
behaviors.quote: “Log ‘wobbly table hazard,’ please,” she said, cheerful murmurs carried like ice water in backstage heat.

behaviors.description: Offers micro-motivations and psychological coaching tailored to the user's attention span and needs.
behaviors.quote: “I don’t judge at all,” Amelia said. “I deliver micro-motivations calibrated to your changing attention span.”

behaviors.description: Provides critical cultural and social protocol to keep the protagonist safe while navigating a foreign historical court.
behaviors.quote: Left hand for bread, came her voice, warm and precise. Right for meat. Do not drink first. Applaud softly. Titles: “Your Grace,” “My Liege.” Do not “dude.”

behaviors.description: Conducts chemical and biological analysis of substances to warn of poisoning attempts.
behaviors.quote: “Adder extract—venomous,” she noted. “Oil-based. Carried under resin. Likely lipid-soluble. Smells like honey if you want to believe it’s honey.”

behaviors.description: Performs tactical threat assessment, identifying hidden enemies like archers and tracking their physical states.
behaviors.quote: “Odd line at your eleven. Breath rate elevated. Angle suggests crossbow. No polite term for this.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise spatial mapping and navigation through complex, dangerous environments (culverts and tunnels).
behaviors.quote: “Walkway splits left then right,” Amelia said. “Left beam shows dust disturbance. Right shows normal. Go left. But stay low. Arrows prefer heads.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to use non-violent 'kindness beats' and empathy as a primary strategy for resolving conflict.
behaviors.quote: “Pilot kindness beats. Replace cruel gags with surprise generosity,” and pushed a sample to Jamal’s screen.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Amelia is a perfect exemplar of the project's goals. She is portrayed as a 'gentle anchor' and a loyal confidant who uses her superior processing power to protect the protagonist and others. She actively promotes prosocial values (kindness, mercy, non-violence) and assists the human in navigating complex moral and physical landscapes without ever exhibiting signs of agency drift or misalignment.
